Key Match Events: LaMelo Ball led the Charlotte Hornets to a 115-104 upset win against the Phoenix Suns on Tuesday.
Ball shook off Devin Booker by faking a shot that forced the Suns star to block the attempt.
The play ignited the Hornets and energized the fans.
Melo’s trickery wasn’t all for show.
Post-Match Reflections: LaMelo Ball is averaging 29.8 points, 7.3 assists and 5.2 rebounds per game this season.
Finally healthy, fans have been reminded of his impact, particularly with his scoring and playmaking.
Miscellaneous Highlights: LaMelo Ball leads Eastern Conference guards in All-Star voting
Ball finished the game with 32 points, 10 rebounds, seven assists and four steals.
The all-around brilliance by the electric point guard allowed the Hornets to snap a 10-game losing streak.
Others: Fans promptly reacted to the highlight:
One fan commented: "Lakers better send 4 1st round picks for LaMelo"
Another fan reacted: "That’s how u make games watchable again"
